problem_name: Cloud Orchestration and Virtual Machine Management
description: Cloud orchestration involves automating the management, coordination, and arrangement of cloud resources, particularly virtual machines. This problem arises when organizations need to efficiently deploy and manage their virtual infrastructure in a cloud environment.
you_have_this_if: You are managing multiple virtual machines across a private cloud.
You experience delays in deploying new virtual machines.
You find it challenging to recover virtual machines after failures.
You are facing complexity in managing cloud resources.
You require a streamlined process for resource allocation.

approaches.best_for: when you need to automate the deployment of virtual machines in a private cloud and reduce management complexity.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Offers automation and simplicity but may require initial setup effort.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a tailored solution for managing virtual machines in a private cloud environment.

start_here: Begin with the Private Cloud Bespoke Orchestrator (PCBO) as it provides a focused solution for automating virtual machine management in private clouds, balancing complexity and efficiency.
